name: monero-dashboard
description: Monero Dashboard for pulling useful information from a local full node.

scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && git add . && git commit -m "create production build"
scripts.init: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npx release patch
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npx release major
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npx release minor

author: John Barlow
